scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run shared:dev" "pnpm run worker:dev" "pnpm run frontend:dev" "pnpm run notification:dev" "pnpm run payment:dev"
scripts.build: pnpm run shared:build && concurrently "pnpm run worker:build" "pnpm run frontend:build" "pnpm run notification:build" "pnpm run payment:build"
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.migrate: cd worker && npx wrangler d1 migrations apply gutter_db --env production
scripts.deploy: pnpm run shared:build && npm run migrate && npm run deploy:worker && npm run deploy:notification && npm run deploy:payment && npm run deploy:frontend
